name: Jennifer B. CROUSE v. Robert R. SLOAT et al.

parties:
Jennifer B. CROUSE
v.
Robert R. SLOAT et al.
attorneys: The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn. App. 901, 164 A.3d 906 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Jennifer B. CROUSE
v.
Robert R. SLOAT et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided December 14, 2017
Jennifer B. Crouse, self-represented, in support of the petition.
James E. Wildes, in opposition.
The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn. App. 901, 164 A.3d 906 (2017), is denied.
MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
